mapper.select: select tfii.*, GROUP_CONCAT( tfis.specification ) specification, GROUP_CONCAT( tfis.quantity ) quantity, GROUP_CONCAT( tfis.contain_price ) containPrice, GROUP_CONCAT( tfis.color_code ) colorCode, GROUP_CONCAT( tfis.color_name ) colorName from t_fabric_ingredients_info tfii left join t_fabric_ingredients_specification tfis on (tfii.id = tfis.ingredients_info_id and tfis.del_flag = '0') ${ew.customSqlSegment}
